skill.name: prescriptive-actions
skill.description: Use when the user asks for recommendations, next steps, best approaches, or ‚Äúwhat should I do‚Äù guidance to achieve a goal or fix a problem.
skill.summary: Use when the user asks for recommendations, next steps, best approaches, or ‚Äúwhat should I do‚Äù guida...
skill.author: BellaBe

security_audit.summary: This skill contains only a SKILL.md markdown file defining a prompt template structure. No executable code, no file access, no network calls, no system commands. Pure documentation-based skill with zero attack surface.

content.value_statement: Users often need clear guidance on what to do next but lack structure for making decisions. This skill provides prioritized recommendations with explicit tradeoffs so users can act confidently.
actual_capabilities: Provide structured recommendations with clear rationale
Identify key risks without mitigation plans
Restate goals in one clear sentence
limitations: Does not create detailed roadmaps or timelines
Does not provide runbooks or checklists
Does not define success criteria or tests
Does not execute or implement any recommendations

use_cases.title: Product strategy decisions
use_cases.description: Get recommendation frameworks for feature prioritization or technical debt decisions with clear tradeoffs

use_cases.title: Technical approach selection
use_cases.description: Receive guidance on architecture choices, library selection, or refactoring strategies with pros and cons

use_cases.title: Incident response direction
use_cases.description: Obtain initial guidance for troubleshooting complex issues when time-sensitive decisions are needed

prompt_templates.title: Basic recommendation request
prompt_templates.prompt: What should I do about [specific situation or problem]?

prompt_templates.title: Approach comparison
prompt_templates.prompt: Compare [Option A] versus [Option B] for [use case or context]. Which approach do you recommend?

prompt_templates.title: Best practice inquiry
prompt_templates.prompt: What is the recommended approach for [task or goal]? Include alternatives and key tradeoffs.

prompt_templates.title: Complex decision support
prompt_templates.prompt: Help me decide on [decision] considering [constraints or requirements]. Provide recommendation with rationale.

output_examples.input: What should I do about our slow database queries?
output: Goal: Improve database query performance to reduce response times.
Recommended approach: Add composite indexes on frequently queried columns and implement query caching.
Alternatives: Database sharding for large datasets, or complete schema redesign for complex relationships.
Tradeoffs: Indexing increases write overhead; caching adds memory usage; sharding adds operational complexity.
Key risks: Unoptimized queries may still cause issues; cache invalidation can lead to stale data.
Immediate next actions: Run query analysis to identify top 10 slowest queries; verify index coverage on WHERE clauses.

best_practices: Ask for tradeoffs explicitly to understand real costs of each option
Request key risks upfront to avoid surprises during implementation
Use immediate next actions to start rather than waiting for perfect plans
anti_patterns: Asking for detailed implementation steps instead of high-level guidance
Requesting complete risk mitigation plans when only direction is needed
Asking for timelines or roadmaps when this skill provides directional guidance

faq.question: Is this skill compatible with all Claude models?
faq.answer: Yes. This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code through standard prompting patterns.

faq.question: What is the maximum complexity of problems this skill handles?
faq.answer: The skill handles most decision guidance scenarios. Extremely domain-specific technical issues may require specialized expertise.

faq.question: How do I combine this with other skills like planning?
faq.answer: Use this skill first for direction, then switch to planning-action for detailed execution roadmaps when ready.

faq.question: Does this skill store or share my data?
faq.answer: No. This is a prompt template skill with no data storage or network access of any kind.

faq.question: Why are there no mitigation plans for risks?
faq.answer: The skill focuses on directional guidance. Full mitigation planning requires deeper analysis available through other skills.

faq.question: How is this different from the planning skill?
faq.answer: Prescriptive-actions provides recommendations and tradeoffs. Planning-action creates detailed timelines and execution steps.
